head.title: Select Usage Plan For Tenant - User Guide

body.p: According to the usage plan that you selected you will get different volume of service and registry bandwidths other services that available for tenants.By selecting right usage plan that suits your requirements you can get maximum profit
This is the free usage plan.You will get limited amount of resources.This package is best suite for evaluation and tests.
This package is best suite for small business.
This usage plan suites for medium scale business.You will get average amount of resources with this package.
This is the premium usage plan.You will get maximum resources form this plan. This is best suite to large scale business.

Usage Plan summery
Usage Plan Name Number Of Users Registry Bandwidth (Mb) Service BandWidth (Mb) Cost Per Month ($)
Multitenancy Free 5 10 10 10
Multitenancy Small 10 25 25 25
Multitenancy Medium 20 100 100 100
Multitenancy Large 50 200 200 200
Figure1: Usage Plan Summery Table
